TITLE: Installing Jora-CLI using NPM
DESCRIPTION: Command to install jora-cli globally using npm package manager.
SOURCE: https://github.com/discoveryjs/jora-cli/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm i -g jora-cli
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Displaying Jora-CLI Help Information
DESCRIPTION: Command to show the help documentation with all available options and usage patterns for jora-cli.
SOURCE: https://github.com/discoveryjs/jora-cli/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
> jora -h
Usage:

    jora [query] [options]

Options:

        --no-color               Suppress color output
        --dry-run                Don't output result, only report what it would have done
    -e, --encoding <encoding>    Output encoding: json (default), jsonxl (snapshot9)
    -f, --force                  Force overwriting output file
    -h, --help                   Output usage information
    -i, --input <filename>       Input file
    -o, --output <filename>      Output file (outputs to stdout if not set)
    -p, --pretty [indent]        Pretty print with optionally specified indentation (4 spaces by default)
    -q, --query <query>          Jora query
        --verbose                Output debug info about actions
    -v, --version                Output version
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Jora Query for Finding Multi-Version Packages
DESCRIPTION: Example Jora query that groups dependencies by name and version, then filters for packages with more than one version.
SOURCE: https://github.com/discoveryjs/jora-cli/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: js
CODE:
```
..(dependencies.entries().({ name: key, ...value }))
    .group(=>name, =>version)
    .({ name: key, versions: value })
    .[versions.size() > 1]
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Extracting Single Field from JSON using Jora-CLI
DESCRIPTION: Example of extracting a specific field (version) from a package.json file using piped input.
SOURCE: https://github.com/discoveryjs/jora-cli/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
jora version <package.json
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Counting Dependencies using Jora-CLI
DESCRIPTION: Command to count all top-level dependencies by combining regular and dev dependencies using file input option.
SOURCE: https://github.com/discoveryjs/jora-cli/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
jora -i package.json -q '(dependencies.keys() + devDependencies.keys()).size()'
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Using Jora Query File to Find Multi-Version Packages
DESCRIPTION: Example of using an external query file with npm ls output to find packages with multiple versions.
SOURCE: https://github.com/discoveryjs/jora-cli/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm ls --json | jora find-multi-version-packages.jora
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Querying JSONXL Files with Jora-CLI
DESCRIPTION: Example of running a Jora query on a JSONXL format input file.
SOURCE: https://github.com/discoveryjs/jora-cli/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
jora <input.jsonxl "select.something"
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Converting JSON to JSONXL Format
DESCRIPTION: Command to convert a JSON file to JSONXL format using encoding option.
SOURCE: https://github.com/discoveryjs/jora-cli/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
jora <input.json >output.jsonxl -e jsonxl
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Converting JSONXL to JSON Format
DESCRIPTION: Command to convert a JSONXL file back to standard JSON format.
SOURCE: https://github.com/discoveryjs/jora-cli/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_8

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
jora <input.jsonxl >output.json
```
